mapper.select: SELECT a.line_code "line_code",a.dcsj "dcsj",a.hckh_flag "hckh_flag", (select b.line_name from line_tab b where a.line_code=b.line_code) "line_name", (case when a.hckh_flag=0 then '否' when a.hckh_flag=1 then '是' END) "kh_flag" FROM xlkhsj_tab a,line_tab b where a.line_code=b.line_code and b.flag=1 AND a.line_code=#{line_code}
